name: Autumn Shores [LD44]
description:
From LD44, 2018, made in 72 hours!

Coding, game design and art by Alex Delderfield

Music by Synthetic Waveforms https://soundcloud.com/syntheticwaveforms

LD page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/44/autumn-shores

Description:

Autumn Shores is a game/prototype about exploration and sailing. Lost on an island, head out and uncover the mysterious infinity st.. erm, gems. Each contains a mysterious power lost to the world (seriously, I didnt get around to implementing the magical upgrades bit). Unlocking all of these gems is the endgame. But as with anything, time (ie your lifespan) is against you (a kind of currency?), so dont take forever!
